Description: This table contains sales activity and performance data, including RSM ID, Model ID, SourceID, open bookings, enquiries, test drives, billing and retail volumes, targets, and transaction dates.
This table stores product hierarchy details such as Model ID, Model Name, and the market Segment for each vehicle model.
This table contains sales personnel hierarchy information, including RSM ID, RSM Name, Regional Office (RO) Name, and Zone Name.
This table holds source master data, mapping source identifiers to their descriptions or categories.
